answers.answer: I have the same problem. My doctor told me eat somethig sweet. Didnt work so now my doctor just says to sit and drink water.
Low blood pressure and low blood sugar can cause it as well. Try increasing your water intake, or sucking on hard candies and see if it helps.

My doctor said my iron level is "lower-end normal.".so I've been taking an extra dosage of iron pills to stay on track..maybe my iron levels should be a little more than normal? I m hoping it's not something more serious.  I'm going to drink more water to see if this helps too.
I have low iron n feel just like that if I forget to take my supplement

question: I am 31 weeks and I've notice that I become dizzy at random times. I eat a decent amount of meals a day and I am not suffering from high blood pressure or gestational diabetes. I can just be walking around the house or having a casual conversation with someone and suddenly become dizzy. This is really weird and scary. Has anyone else been dealing with this?
title: Random Dizziness?
